item.title: Eating well and exercising may be as effective for treating depression as going to therapy - Study Finds
item.description:
1. Eating well and exercising may be as effective for treating depression as going to therapy  Study Finds
  2. Food and exercise can treat depression as well as a psychologist, our study found. And it’s cheaper  The Conversation
  3. A familiar culprit thought to be why depression affects motivation  New Atlas
  4. Nutrition and exercise as good as therapy for mild and moderate depression, study says  The Guardian
  5. New clues point towards how exercise reduces symptoms of depression  Medical Xpress
